title: I Did all missions but I haven't received the skin yet !
body:
As I wrote in the title I Did all missions today but I haven't received the skin and the summoner icon yet, is it because I must just wait or maybe because I didn't play enough hours ?

(I haven't got any problem with the blue essence)

Thanks in advance

replies.body: Hey there, I looked into this for you but was unable to locate a skin mission.  It looks like the only rune page purchased was for IP which was already converted, but the skins were specifically for RP purchased pages.  Sorry for the confusion!

Hey Porocles,

could you also look into my account? I dont wanna sound greedy or something but I feel like it didnt calculate the BE correctly in the loot tab after I added them. Also I didn't get any mystery skin shards as far as I saw it. I did all the quests, and I think I also bought a couple pages with RP back then.

Thanks in advance :)

I looked into this for you, but don't see any issues.  You did get a lot of Greater runes in the past, and it successfully converted to BE within your capsules.  Your IP balance was pretty low, so most of your conversion was from the rune refunds.

The Rune Pages you unlocked were with IP, so they would be converted into your BE capsule instead of skins.  The skins were only for pages unlocked with RP.  Let me know if that clears things up!

Thanks for the answer :)

Alright, well I'm not 100 % sure whether I bought pages for RP, doesn't really matter now anyways since I couldn't proof it :D
Yes my IP balance was pretty low because I kept buying champion shards and disenchanted them for BE.

Well I guess everything is alright then.

Thank you very much!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=jHVptWeE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-08T22:14:16.572+0000)
>
> Hey there, I looked into this for you but was unable to locate a skin mission.  It looks like the only rune page purchased was for IP which was already converted, but the skins were specifically for RP purchased pages.  Sorry for the confusion!

Hey! Could you look into mine? I'm fairly certain i bought a 3-page bundle a while back with RP when they were on an RP sale but didn't get the skin mission
Hey, sure!  I do see a total for 4 rune pages, but they were all purchased with IP.
cheers porocles, shame, really thought i had spent rp on em ;-;
I'm in the same boat.  I think I used RP for them but not sure.  Haven't received rewards though I got the completed quest popup.
I'm sorry also I thought to had spent rp my fault.
I haven't received my skins neither.
